      • imagesWidthPercent

        public static double imagesWidthPercent
        Width of images from left edge of page as a percent of the total page width in decimal (i.e. specify 100% as 1)

      • imagesHeightPercent

        public static double imagesHeightPercent
        Height of images specified as a percent of imagesWidth in decimal (i.e. specify 184% as 1.84). Used to maintain the aspect ratio of the image in Internet Explorer

      • imagesTopPercent

        public static double imagesTopPercent
        Position of images from top of page as a percent of the total page height in decimal (i.e. specify 8% as .08)
